item.title: Donations needed for Encampment Residents Arrested at Sweep...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Homeless Out Loud

Donations needed for Encampment Residents Arrested at Sweep

Yesterday, cops arrested 4 people while sweeping the Arkins encampment. All of them were charged with "disobeying a lawful order." This means, tell police they have a right to survive or simply being where the cops don't want you.
The community is raising money to get them out of jail, and then also to get the 3 folks who are unhoused who were arrested a night in a hotel and a tent and sleeping bag.

...

You can donate on venmo at @makenalam

Two of those who were arrested spoke at the press conference on Saturday. Watch their speeches here...

Searia Speaking at Press Conferencehttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yp0hq8LjtdU&fbclid=IwAR0CGPsC3tKSpK1vxLhuZitagtENR5aNnT15OKUbhu5rWIbecxXVeL5_WNs

King Speaking at Press Conferencehttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8A_nWf2waHE&fbclid=IwAR0J4T7q7JqD5AS1hxQzI9Go1hzbW-aPTEdf0wRssYYqtg4vSWExZL-xABE

See More
item.author: Denver Homeless Out Loud

item.title: The SWEEP of the Arkins camp today was a disgusting display of...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Homeless Out Loud

The SWEEP of the Arkins camp today was a disgusting display of authority and abuse. Denver Police Department maced and pepper sprayed community volunteers who were present to advocate for the rights of the unhoused and support them in moving. There were 3 camp residents arrested and one community advocate. Approximately ⅓ of the camp was swept to nowhere. No residents were offered housing and only one resident was offered a motel voucher for only 3 days. We spoke to one resid...ent who was moving her belongings to the next spot and while she was gone, DDPHE and DPD trashed all of her remaining belongings including one of her kids’ child seats, diapers and clothing, and the family heater. DDPHE and DPD refused to be responsible and replace those necessary items for survival. We also had an overwhelming request for tents. Before leaving, the Denver Police Department left a large flood light and video set up that will remain until the end of the SWEEP which will continue tomorrow.

Your help is still needed! We will be back out tomorrow to support this camp and residents. Please come and support our unhoused community members at 29th and Arkins on Tuesday December 1st.

Bring the following things to assist residents:

-Truck, or any vehicle to help

-Carts

-Bungee Cords

-Rope

-Trash Bags

-Food

-Coffee/CoCo

-Water

Your assistance is much appreciated. Somewhere around 6am and all day help will likely be needed.

Onward towards Rights, Dignity, Housing...

See More
item.author: Denver Homeless Out Loud

item.title: Here is part 6 although it is labeled 7- A compliation of...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Homeless Out Loud

Here is part 6 although it is labeled 7- A compliation of highlights is in the works but is not ready yet.

The Playlist isn't loading right... will try and fix it in the meantime here are the statements from Saturdays Press Conference. Not that mainstream media would give any attention to the largest camp in the city getting swept. Especially this close to the xmass selling season.
Remember a couple of people chose not to speak who were scheduled to, due to early police p...resence just before the press conference. Not that the media there tood notice and reported it.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yp0hq8LjtdU

item.title: Will be collecting the news coverage of today massive sweep...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Homeless Out Loud

Will be collecting the news coverage of today massive sweep here. I find it strange that the mainstream media outlets are absent. They were all over the Morrey Middle School sweep this summer ... but they work in that area and many live near where they work.

https://koanewsradio.iheart.com/…/2020-11-30-denver-plans-…/

The City of Denver is planning a homeless sweep near 29th and Arkins in RiNo. We talk with Terese Howard of Denver's Homeless Out Loud, who says this sweep is a bad idea.

koanewsradio.iheart.com

Denver Plans Homeless Sweep in RiNo | KOA NewsRadio 850 AM & 94.1 FM | Colorado's Morning News

The City of Denver is planning a homeless sweep near 29th and Arkins in RiNo. We talk with Terese Howard of Denver's Homeless Out Loud, who says this sweep is a bad idea.The City of Denver is planning a homeless sweep near 29th and Arkins in RiNo. We talk with Terese Howard of Denver's Homeless Out Loud, who says this sweep is a bad idea.
